1585004492_1G9k2b4cSRzZSfLQuzxmpJB3LT3Gf.body:
> [aspidochelone](#comment_382_1PPUrYcZ1E1rGkkE6PH18Qi43LRsKABo1Z): Why would the vaccine be a mark of the beast?  A good tree bears good fruit ... if the vaccine saves lives, how can it be evil?  Don't be turned into a tool for the virus.
I don't think that the OP means to conflate the vaccine with the being the mark itself. The mark is not a literal mark. In christian theology the forehead is associated with ones thoughts and state of mind, the right hand is associated with ones deeds and the pattern of ones life. If you accept the new system that will come, THAT is the mark, not some tatoo or chip or whatever. God doesn't care so much about physical marks as he does about the spiritual marks on a person.
